changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for Post-operative Anaesthesia Note Form

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding new Numeric concepts to numeric table

changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("None","GAI","GAO","GAL","RSA","RPX","RTA","RAO","SED","INF","LOA") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "POAN, Primary type of anaesthesia administered");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Primary type of anaesthesia administered

changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("None","GAI","GAO","GAL","RSA","RPX","RTA","RAO","SED","INF","LOA") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "POAN, Secondary type of anaesthesia administered");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Secondary type of anaesthesia administered

changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("None","Allergic reaction","Bronchospasm","Cardiac dysrhythmia","Damage to teeth","Hypotension","Hypothermia <35C","Hyperthermia >39C","Patient position injuries","Pulmonary aspiration","Unanticipated bleeding","Death","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "POAN, Complication of anaesthesia");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Complication of anaesthesia

changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes","No") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "POAN, Blood transfusion");

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("None","Whole blood","PRBC","FFP","Platelets","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "POAN, Intra-operative blood products");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Intra-operative blood products

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("None","ABO incompatibility","Anaphylaxis","Fever","Haemolysis","Hypotension","Rash","Urticaria","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "POAN, Intra-operative transfusion related reaction");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Intra-operative transfusion related reaction

changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("None","Foley Catheter","Peripheral IV","Suprapubic Catheter","Drain","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "POAN, Devices present");

changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ("149086","108","120148","158592","136602","144464","136602","161939","161925","161926","161900","150787","148888","140238","116214","512","156339","152714") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "CEIL" and retired =0 );
